languages.text: Чтобы отпереть дверь, взаимодействуйте с иконкой над когитатором — персонаж с самым высоким показателем {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Логики{/g} совершит {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навыка{/g}. При провале проверки дверь останется закрытой. Особенно неудачный результат проверки Логики может привести к тому, что дверь заклинит насовсем, и открыть ее будет уже невозможно.
languages.original_text: To open the door, interact with the icon above the cogitator — the character with the highest {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g} will make the {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If this test fails, the door will remain closed. A particularly bad result of a Logic test can cause the door to become permanently stuck and impossible to open.

traits.locale_text: Чтобы отпереть заклинившую дверь, взаимодействуйте с иконкой — персонаж с самым высоким показателем {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Техники{/g} совершит проверку {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навыка{/g}. При провале проверки дверь останется закрытой. Особенно неудачный результат проверки Техники может привести к тому, что дверь заклинит насовсем, и открыть ее будет уже невозможно.

languages.text: To open the door, interact with the icon above the cogitator — the character with the highest {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g} will make the {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If this test fails, the door will remain closed. A particularly bad result of a Logic test can cause the door to become permanently stuck and impossible to open.
languages.original_text: Чтобы отпереть дверь, взаимодействуйте с иконкой над когитатором — персонаж с самым высоким показателем {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Логики{/g} совершит {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навыка{/g}. При провале проверки дверь останется закрытой. Особенно неудачный результат проверки Логики может привести к тому, что дверь заклинит насовсем, и открыть ее будет уже невозможно.

traits.locale_text: To open a jammed door, interact with the icon — the character with the highest {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g} skill score will make the {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} test. If this test fails, the door will remain closed. A particularly bad result of a Tech-Use test can cause the door to become permanently stuck and impossible to open.

To open the door, interact with the icon above the cogitator — the character with the highest {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g} will make the {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If this test fails, the door will remain closed. A particularly bad result of a Logic test can cause the door to become permanently stuck and impossible to open.

To open a jammed door, interact with the icon — the character with the highest {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g} will make the {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If this test fails, the door will remain closed. A particularly bad result of a Tech-Use test can cause the door to become permanently stuck and impossible to open.

To open a jammed door, interact with the icon — the character with the highest {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g} will make the {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If this test fails, the door will remain closed. A particularly bad result of a Tech-Use test can cause the door to become permanently stuck and impossible to open.

languages.text: Interactúa con el icono de encima del cogitador para abrir la puerta. El personaje con más {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Lógica{/g} hará la {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g}. En caso de que no supere la prueba, la puerta permanecerá cerrada. Si una prueba de Lógica concluye con un resultado estrepitoso, la puerta puede quedarse atascada para siempre y no volverse a abrir.
languages.original_text: To open the door, interact with the icon above the cogitator — the character with the highest {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g} will make the {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If this test fails, the door will remain closed. A particularly bad result of a Logic test can cause the door to become permanently stuck and impossible to open.

traits.locale_text: Interactúa con el icono de encima del cogitador para abrir la puerta. El personaje con más {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Lógica{/g} hará la {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g}. En caso de que no supere la prueba, la puerta permanecerá cerrada. Si una prueba de Lógica concluye con un resultado estrepitoso, la puerta puede quedarse atascada para siempre y no volverse a abrir.

languages.text: ドアを開けるには、考算機の上のアイコンを操作する。最も高い{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}論理{/g}を持つキャラクターが、{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を行う。 この判定に失敗すると、ドアは閉ざされたままになる。論理判定結果が特に悪かった場合、ドアは永久に開けなくなる。
languages.original_text: To open the door, interact with the icon above the cogitator — the character with the highest {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g} will make the {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If this test fails, the door will remain closed. A particularly bad result of a Logic test can cause the door to become permanently stuck and impossible to open.

traits.locale_text: ドアを開けるには、考算機の上のアイコンを操作する。最も高い{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}論理{/g}を持つキャラクターが、{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を行う。 この判定に失敗すると、ドアは閉ざされたままになる。論理判定結果が特に悪かった場合、ドアは永久に開けなくなる。

languages.text: 若要打开卡住的门，请与沉思者上方的图标进行互动。{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}逻辑{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}修正值最高的角色会进行技能{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。 如果检定失败，门会继续关闭。如果逻辑技能检定的结果特别糟糕，可能会导致门被彻底卡住，再也无法打开。
languages.original_text: To open the door, interact with the icon above the cogitator — the character with the highest {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g} will make the {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If this test fails, the door will remain closed. A particularly bad result of a Logic test can cause the door to become permanently stuck and impossible to open.

traits.locale_text: 若要打开卡住的门，请与沉思者上方的图标进行互动。{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}逻辑{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}修正值最高的角色会进行技能{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。 如果检定失败，门会继续关闭。如果逻辑技能检定的结果特别糟糕，可能会导致门被彻底卡住，再也无法打开。

languages.text: Um die Tür zu öffnen, interagiere mit dem Symbol über dem Cogitator – der Charakter mit dem höchsten {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logik{/g}-Wert macht die {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeitsprobe{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}probe/b>{/g}. Misslingt diese Probe, bleibt die Tür geschlossen. Ein besonders schlechtes Ergebnis einer Probe auf Logik kann dazu führen, dass die Tür dauerhaft klemmt und sich nicht mehr öffnen lässt.
languages.original_text: To open the door, interact with the icon above the cogitator — the character with the highest {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g} will make the {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If this test fails, the door will remain closed. A particularly bad result of a Logic test can cause the door to become permanently stuck and impossible to open.

traits.locale_text: Um die Tür zu öffnen, interagiere mit dem Symbol über dem Cogitator – der Charakter mit dem höchsten {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logik{/g}-Wert macht die {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeitsprobe{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}probe/b>{/g}. Misslingt diese Probe, bleibt die Tür geschlossen. Ein besonders schlechtes Ergebnis einer Probe auf Logik kann dazu führen, dass die Tür dauerhaft klemmt und sich nicht mehr öffnen lässt.

languages.text: Pour ouvrir la porte, interagissez avec l'icône surplombant le cogitateur. Le personnage doté du plus haut niveau de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logique{/g} effectuera le {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétence{/g}. En cas d'échec, la porte restera fermée. Un résultat particulièrement mauvais lors d'un test de Logique peut entraîner le blocage permanent de la porte.
languages.original_text: To open the door, interact with the icon above the cogitator — the character with the highest {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g} will make the {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If this test fails, the door will remain closed. A particularly bad result of a Logic test can cause the door to become permanently stuck and impossible to open.

traits.locale_text: Pour ouvrir la porte, interagissez avec l'icône surplombant le cogitateur. Le personnage doté du plus haut niveau de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logique{/g} effectuera le {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétence{/g}. En cas d'échec, la porte restera fermée. Un résultat particulièrement mauvais lors d'un test de Logique peut entraîner le blocage permanent de la porte.

languages.text: Kapıyı açmak için kavramsayarın üstündeki simgeyle etkileşime gir. En yüksek {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Mantık{/g} yeteneğine sahip olan karakter, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}yetenek{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testine{/g} girecektir. Test başarısız olursa kapı kapalı kalır. Mantık testinin en kötü sonucu ise kapının kalıcı olarak sıkışması olur. Bu durumda kapının açılması imkânsız hâle gelir.
languages.original_text: To open the door, interact with the icon above the cogitator — the character with the highest {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g} will make the {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If this test fails, the door will remain closed. A particularly bad result of a Logic test can cause the door to become permanently stuck and impossible to open.
